This is... #SHMUPFEST!

trailer

23 apr. 2014

Hi,

The Stunfest 2014 is really close now… and we have released a trailer for the Shmupfest! ;)

As you can see, the Shmupfest integrates our BulletML for Unity plugin to create those awesome patterns.


Have fun!

You can also follow the Shmupfest and Pixelnest on twitter.
